overview.en: In the direction of network, the ultimate goal of KGXS is to extend a universal coexistence chain (based on encryption and intelligent contracts) for any platform application on the basis of traditional digital currency.Implementation, no restrictions on any enterprise or individual, global node management, consumption of a wide range of areas of sustainable cycle incentives, in the next 10 years will be the new favorite of the block chain, and more truly let the global technology team of the block chain join us to create a big ecosystem.
overview.zh: 朝着网的方向发展，KGXS的终极目标就是在传统数字货币的基础上，将延伸出一条适用于任何平台应用的万能共世链（建立在加密与智能合约执行，无限制任何企业或个人，全球节点经营、消费广大领域永续循环奖励，未来十年间将是区块链界新宠），更能让全球有真正区块链技术团队加入我们创造大生态。
